info.name: Permission Registry Service API
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman collection for the Onified.ai Permission Registry Service, running on port 9082. Includes Actions, Scopes, Constraints (General, Field, Contextual), PBUs, PBU Associations, Roles, Role Inheritance, and Role Constraint Overrides.

***IMPORTANT: For Role creation/update, ensure the 'appCode' and 'moduleCode' exist and are active in your Application Config Service (running on http://localhost:9081).***

item.name: GET General Constraint by ID - GC_PLANT_101
GET General Constraint by ID - NON_EXISTENT
UPDATE General Constraint - GC_DEPARTMENT_HR (Update Rule Logic)

body.raw:
{
    "constraintId": "GC_DEPARTMENT_HR",
    "constraintName": "Access to HR Department and Active Employees",
    "tableName": "employees",
    "columnName": "department",
    "valueType": "CUSTOM_VALUE",
    "customValue": "{\"operator\": \"=\", \"value\": \"HR\"}",
    "ruleLogic": "{\"condition\": \"AND\", \"rules\": [{\"field\": \"department\", \"operator\": \"=\", \"value\": \"HR\"}, {\"field\": \"status\", \"operator\": \"=\", \"value\": \"ACTIVE\"}]}",
    "isActive": true
}
